geohash_mapper package¶

Submodules¶

geohash_mapper.geohash_mapper module¶

Read point metadata and create a geohash density heat map as a GeoJSON Feature Collection

geohash_mapper.geohash_mapper.density_geohash(input_point_collections, precision=8)¶
Parameters

  • input_point_collection – list of wkt strings for points that need to be aggregated

  • precision – precision for the geohash encoder. Default is 8.

Returns

a Geopandas Dataframe of geohash mapping a count and color to each hash polygon

geohash_mapper.geohash_mapper.read_geojson_metadata(geojson_file, start_epoch, end_epoch)¶

Reads metadata from geojson file from an input directory and returns a list of wkt strings for points within the given time range

param geojson_file

directory with input metadata geojson files

param start_epoch

start of time range in epoch

param end_epoch

end of time range in epoch

return

list of wkt strings for points within the given time range

Module contents¶

__init__ for allowing imports
